definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: An indirectly determination of water content in sodium pyrosulphate is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種間接測定焦亞硫酸鈉中水分含量的方法。

sentences.english: Chemical wood pulp, sulphite, other than dissolving grades.
sentences.chinese: 亞硫酸鹽木漿，但溶解級的除外。

sentences.english: The dissipated sulfur dioxide was absorbed by the lime cream and applied for preparation of the calcium hydrogen sulfite.
sentences.chinese: 放出的二氧化硫經石灰乳吸收用來製備亞硫酸氫鈣。

sentences.english: When sodium dithionite is used, the effect is excellent.
sentences.chinese: 用連二亞硫酸鈉處理，效果顯著。

sentences.english: Coniferous chemical wood pulp, sulphite other than dissolving grades, unbleached.
sentences.chinese: 針葉樹亞硫酸鹽化學木漿，溶解級除外，未漂白。

sentences.english: Pretreatment with alkali before chlorination was studied in bleached acid sulfite poplar pulp production.
sentences.chinese: 對酸性亞硫酸鹽法楊木漿的氯化前鹼處理進行了研究。

sentences.english: This paper studied on the HMP bleaching for the magnesium bisulfite pulp of whole stalk kenaf.
sentences.chinese: 對紅麻亞硫酸氫鎂漿HMP三段漂白進行了研究。

sentences.english: Extraction of cobalt was masked by sulfite ion.
sentences.chinese: 鈷的萃取被亞硫酸鹽離子遮蔽。

sentences.english: 3a. But wines in Europe dont have sulfites, right?
sentences.chinese: 但歐洲的葡萄酒裏不含亞硫酸鹽，對嗎？

sentences.english: The residues of sulphites in products differ owing to the different processing method and adding amounts.
sentences.chinese: 製品中亞硫酸鹽的殘留量因加工方式和添加量而異。

sentences.english: The process for removing the chromium from the silicon steel plant wastewaters was studied by using sodium sulfite as reducer.
sentences.chinese: 用亞硫酸鈉爲還原劑對硅鋼含鉻廢水進行了試驗研究。

sentences.english: No refined sugar or sulfites added.
sentences.chinese: 無糖精，無亞硫酸鹽，無化學添加。

sentences.english: Wine and other foods containing Sulfites.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄酒及其它含有亞硫酸鹽的食物。

sentences.english: Sodium pyrosulfite on the impact was not obvious.
sentences.chinese: 焦亞硫酸鈉對迷迭香酸的影響不明顯。

sentences.english: This paper describes the study of peroxide bleaching for neutro-sulfite reed pulp.
sentences.chinese: 研究了中性亞硫酸鹽葦漿的過氧化物漂白。

sentences.english: For that, we use powdered sodium metabisulfite.
sentences.chinese: 因此我們要用到粉末狀的焦亞硫酸鈉。
